Summary: It was a dull stainless steel color, about 12-15 feet in diameter and was about five feet tall.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Junction City
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details I was headed home after leaving my girlfriends house.At a distnace I noticed what appeared to be a very bright falling star. IN a moment I noticed the sky appearing to light up in the distance. Suddely I saw that the woods were getting very bright a short distance away. In a moment I realized that everything had gotten bright. The entire area had become like daylight. I looked up above my vehicle and noticed an object hovering . It wasn't spinning but was moving the same speed I was moving. I stucki my head out the window to get a better look and realized that it was not making any sound. At that time it was about it was about 200 feet high. I began to speed up and was followed and the object got lower. After about one-half mile it got down to about 30 feet above my vehicle. The object shinned a very bright light on me which made me unable to see for what seemed like only a short time. As the light went out I was able to see the bones in my hands and arms for a split second. I looked and saw the object hovering beside my vehicle about 3 feet above the ground. IN the blink of an eye it went up and out of sight. I went into town and didn't see anyone. I went home and awakened my mother to tell her. She was concerned because it was almost 3 pm. in the morning. The trip from my girlfriends home took about 10 to 12 minutes. I had experienced a loss of time and I also remember experiencing some vomiting after I got home.
